Key Match Events: Denzel Dumfries headed a late equaliser for the Netherlands to rescue a point
Virgil van Dijk received two yellow cards in the space of three minutes and was sent off
Roland Sallai scored Hungary's goal on 32' minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Dumfries praised the team for holding their ground and becoming successful
Van Dijk explained his actions and accepted the red card
Hungary ended a run of nine straight defeats against the Dutch
Miscellaneous Highlights: Van Dijk's red card was his first with the Netherlands
The game took place at Puskás Aréna in Budapest
The line was NED -0.5 and the Over/Under was 2.5
